briefing.opening: Hello everyone. We will now commence the 2025-12-21 climate briefing.

sections.title: Domestic Implementation of Carbon Neutrality Goals and Acceleration of Industrial Transition
sections.content: Domestically, various efforts are underway to achieve carbon neutrality goals. HL Mando has officially received approval from SBTi for its goal of '63% greenhouse gas reduction by 2035' [3]. While 40% of automotive parts companies recognize the necessity of carbon neutrality, Hyundai Motor and Kia are supporting supply chain transformation in cooperation with public and private sectors [7, 11]. In local communities, Gyeongbuk Province received the highest rating in the carbon-neutral lifestyle practice evaluation [8]. Various local governments, including Jinju City, Seosan City, and Nowon District, are leading the creation of eco-friendly cities through initiatives such as hosting the 2050 Carbon Neutrality Forum and holding regular committee meetings [9, 12, 13]. aT also received the 'Consumer ESG Innovation Grand Prize' for its efforts in responding to climate change, thereby emphasizing the responsible role of corporations [1].

sections.title: ğŸŒ± Groundbreaking Progress in Renewable Energy Transition and Policy Initiatives
sections.content: Encouraging news has been reported in the field of energy transition. This year, renewable energy for the first time surpassed fossil fuel energy, earning it a spot on Science Magazine's 'Breakthrough of the Year' list [14]. Domestically, aligning with this trend, the government and ruling party have announced the swift processing of the Special Act on Renewable Energy Self-Sufficient Cities and the commencement of RE100 industrial complex development, thereby accelerating the energy transition [17, 21]. The Climate Ministry is simultaneously pursuing the expansion of sluice gates and tidal power generation in Saemangeum, aiming for both water quality improvement and renewable energy expansion [16], and the Daegu Regional Environmental Office is also accelerating the renewable energy transition in the Daegu-Gyeongbuk region, demonstrating active efforts at the local government level [18]. In Gochang County, a policy forum was held for the creation of a new and renewable energy complex [15], and calls for accelerating energy transition through the installation of solar panels in public parking lots have also been raised, indicating comprehensive transition efforts are being observed [20].

sections.title: âš ï¸ The climate crisis becoming a reality and domestic and international policy challenges
sections.content: As the climate crisis materializes, accelerating the transformation of industrial and energy structures is becoming even more urgent [2]. However, domestically, there is criticism that the continued vehicle idling within the National Assembly is undermining carbon neutrality goals [6], and questions have also been raised regarding the exclusion of nuclear power generation from the Ministry of Climate's work report, asking if this signifies a declaration of abandoning carbon neutrality [10]. Internationally, there have been calls for data centers to make greater efforts to combat climate change [29], and reports also indicate that liberals are gradually stepping back from apocalyptic predictions regarding climate change, demonstrating the complexity of the climate response discourse [27].

sections.title: ğŸŒ International Impacts and Adaptation to Climate Change, Awareness-Raising Efforts
sections.content: Climate change is affecting the world in various forms, and a scientific possibility has even been raised that global warming could trigger the next ice age [26]. Amid concerns that national park travel is becoming unpredictable [24] and that even everyday things like Rudolph and white Christmases will be affected [23], climate change is also occurring in Pakistan [28, 30]. In this situation, international policy efforts are continuing, such as Abu Dhabi's carbon-neutral city experiment [4, 5] and GCF's support for strengthening Thailand's climate adaptation capacity [31]. Awareness-raising efforts are also active, including travelers' climate change offsetting actions [25] and climate folk songs in Maine, USA [22]. Notably, Kenya's Women in Climate Change Organization (WICCO) is promoting environmental conservation and food security through tree planting and vegetable garden cultivation education [32, 33]. In the Venice Lagoon region, research on halophytes is underway to address soil salinization issues caused by rising sea levels [34], demonstrating active exploration of community-level adaptation strategies.

briefing.closing: Today's briefing highlighted progress in domestic and international carbon neutrality efforts and a positive trend in renewable energy transition. However, it simultaneously underscored the need for sustained attention and effort concerning policy challenges for climate crisis response and their international implications. This concludes today's climate briefing.

summary.phenomenon: On Saturday, December 20, 2025, Diana Mutoni, Chairperson of the Women in Climate Change Organization (WICCO), and Rosemary Njenga, Officer-in-Charge of Murang'a Women's Prison, participated in a tree-planting event at the prison.

articles.title: Women in Climate Change Organization (WICCO) members and prison officers learn how to establish a kitchen garden at the prison premises during a tree-planting exercise aimed at promoting environmental conservation, food security, and skills transfer. Th - facebook.com

summary.phenomenon: During a tree-planting event, members of the Women's Climate Change Organization (WICCO) and prison staff learned how to establish a vegetable garden on the prison grounds. This event aimed to promote environmental conservation, food security, and technology transfer.
summary.outlook: Environmental conservation, food security, and technology transfer are expected to be promoted.

articles.title: The plants that thrive in salt: could halophytes help save coastal farming?

summary.phenomenon: In the Venice lagoon area, rising sea levels are causing soil salinization. Consequently, scientists and chefs are turning their attention to salt-tolerant plants known as halophytes (e.g., samphire).
summary.cause: Soil salinization in the Venice Lagoon area is occurring due to sea level rise.
summary.outlook: Halophyte plants are expected to be able to help save salinized coastal agriculture.
